intro: Aschenfeldtia pimeleoides, commonly known as the false sandwort, is a low-growing perennial plant native to the Arctic and subarctic regions. Aschenfeldtia pimeleoides is adapted to harsh conditions, making it a common sight in alpine and tundra habitats.
